original_text: “As for you, son of man, your people are talking together about you by the walls and at the doors of the houses, saying to each other, ‘Come and hear the message that has come from the Lord.’
korean_text: 인자야 네 민족이 담 곁에서와 집 문에서 너에 대하여 말하며 각각 그 형제와 더불어 말하여 이르기를 자, 가서 여호와께로부터 무슨 말씀이 나오는가 들어 보자 하고

sentences.original_text: As for you, son of man,
your people are talking together about you
sentences.korean_translation: 네 백성이 너를 두고 서로 말하기를

sentences.original_text: by the walls and at the doors of the houses,
that has come from the Lord.
